# PCAWG7

## Purpose

Contains data from Alexandrov, Kim, Haradhvala, Huang et al.,
   'Repertoire of Mutational Signatures in Human Cancer'. Please see `?PCAWG7`.
    The reference for the data is Alexandrov, L.B., Kim, J., 
    Haradhvala, N.J. et al. The repertoire of mutational signatures 
    in human cancer. Nature 578, 94-101 (2020).
    https://doi.org/10.1038/s41586-020-1943-3. The funny name
    comes from the fact that this paper was generated by
    Working Group 7 of the Pan Cancer Analysis of Whole Genomes
    (PCAWG) consortium.

## Installation

Install PCAWG7 from the master branch on [GitHub](https://github.com/):

``` r
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("steverozen/PCAWG7")
```
